promptResponse.title: Prompt Response
promptResponse.description:
The AI-generated response based on the search results from the Default ABC Retriever. This output contains the formatted answer to the user's query along with webpage source links.

**Content Includes:**
- Relevant information retrieved from the ABC knowledge base
- Structured and formatted answer
- **Webpage URLs extracted from the citation metadata**
- **Clearly labeled source links at the end of the response**
- Special indicator "NO_RESULTS_FOUND_TIER_2" if no relevant information is found

**Link Format Requirements:**
- Extract webpage URL from citation metadata
- Display as: "**Source:** [URL]" or "**Read more at:** [URL]"
- Ensure URLs are clickable hyperlinks
- List multiple URLs if information comes from multiple sources
- Place all source links in a dedicated section at the end of the response

**Processing Logic:**
- If response contains "NO_RESULTS_FOUND_TIER_2": Proceed to fallback message action
- If response contains relevant information: Display answer with webpage links to user and end topic flow

**Usage:** This output drives the conditional logic for the 3-tier search strategy and provides users with direct access to source webpages

citations.title: Citations
citations.description:
Source citations from the Default ABC Retriever that support the information in the Prompt Response. Provides transparency and allows users to verify the source of information, including webpage URLs.

**Content Includes:**
- Document titles or names from the ABC knowledge base
- Relevant excerpts or snippets from source documents
- **Webpage URLs or links to original source materials**
- Reference identifiers for traceability
- Confidence scores or relevance indicators

**Webpage Link Extraction:**
- Citations should include the full webpage URL when available
- Extract from metadata fields such as: url, source_url, web_url, link, or document_url
- Prioritize official ABC NC website URLs (https://www.abc.nc.gov/*)
- Ensure links are properly formatted and functional

**Display Behavior:**
- Only shown when Prompt Response contains actual results
- Hidden when "NO_RESULTS_FOUND_TIER_2" is returned
- Formatted according to the Citation Mode setting (detailed)
- **Webpage links are prominently displayed and clickable**

**Purpose:** Builds user trust by providing verifiable sources with direct access to original webpage content
